70010000070243.description:
I will awaken the magic within you, and you will free us from the Rêve...

Set in a wondrously evocative re-imagining of France, a beautifully crafted otome visual novel following Emma, orphaned at a young age, as she fights to uncover her forgotten memories. A witch who lost her powers when young and now living a quiet life, Emma is led by the memento her father left her and finds herself swept away with the arrival of a travelling amusement park in town.

Filled with magic and dreams but holding a dark secret, Emma feels an immediate connection to the wondrous La Foire du Rêve. She discovers that hidden underneath the lustrous fairy-like charm of the park, its employees are trapped, bound to the amusement park and only the magic within Emma can free them. But it has been years since Emma has been able to access her magic, and she must dig deep within herself, navigating painful repressed memories, in order to recover it.

Working at the Rêve as she unravels the tangled threads of her forgotten past, Emma forges bonds with the employees of the amusement park. A cast of wonderful characters; the dazzling director Hugo, the stoic accountant Serge, the Tsundere Performer Crier, the kind-hearted rabbit Lyon, the Reclusive Mechanic Luciole, and Emma’s special childhood friend, Arnaud. Each character with their own crosses to bear, stories of tragedy and longing woven together with desperation, Emma builds deepening bonds of friendship, and maybe more, as she works to unlock her magic and their freedom.

With its gorgeously subdued artwork, radiating warmth and romance, Genso Manège is a dream-like otome fantasy with an outstanding visual power that conjures an unforgettably bittersweet tale.
70010000070243.intro: A magical mystery brimming with romance
70010000070243.name: Genso Manège

70010000082746.description:
The highly anticipated sequel to one of 2022’s most acclaimed RPGs!

You are a sleeper, an emulation of a human mind housed in an artificial body. You are on the run from the corporation that made you and the gang that seeks to control you. Commandeer a ship, build a network of crew and allies, and take on challenging contracts as you seek to build a future for yourself.

Choose a class, configure your skills and assemble your crew in unique tabletop-inspired gameplay. Your future depends on the roll of a dice, as you make difficult choices in a complex world. Reinventing the award-winning systems of Citizen Sleeper, this RPG will satisfy both fans of the original game and new players alike.

STAY AHEAD OF YOUR PAST
After a desperate attempt to free yourself from servitude by rewriting the very code that governs your system, you are on the run again, this time with a malfunctioning body, a price on your head and no memory of your past.

REBOOT / REBUILD / REPAIR
Citizen Sleeper’s revolutionary dice system returns, revised for the sequel. Manage your stress or take damage to your dice. Deal with glitches as they accrue in your system. Push yourself to get lucky and make this cycle count.

PUSH YOUR LUCK
Each character class now has a unique “Push” ability that can help you turn the tide of a difficult job or send you into a dangerous spiral depending on how and when you choose to use it. Reroll your dice to change your fate, or focus a single die to bet everything on a big success.

NAVIGATE THE BELT
Chart a course from hub to hub with complete freedom, taking on jobs and setting goals as you see fit. A living world, the Starward Belt rewards curiosity and care, but it's up to you to decide which locations and stories deserve your time and resources.

DO THE JOB, GET PAID
Contracts offer a new kind of focussed, tactical gameplay to the Citizen Sleeper experience. You’ll need to prepare carefully and choose the right approach for these multi-cycle, high-risk, high-reward jobs, but you’ll also have to react and adapt to both the roll of the dice and the twists and turns of each task.

CHOOSE YOUR FUTURE
Player choice is a massive part of the Citizen Sleeper experience, and the sequel deepens this with new skill checks that allow you to express your class and character in scenes, as well as branching storylines that will ask you to make hard choices. The future of your character is up to you.
70010000082746.name: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector

70010000089357.description:
Prepare to immerse yourself in a bone-chilling adventure. Unravel the truth, face your fears, and expose the hidden darkness that lies within Whittingham Asylum. The answers await you, brave investigator!

Calling all brave investigators! 
Prepare to embark on a chilling journey as you step into the shoes of John Simmons, a determined journalist, in search of the truth. Uncover the mysteries that shroud the local Whittingham Psychiatric Hospital and face the horrors that await within.

Follow the Trail of Fear
As the investigation intensifies, you stumble upon an intriguing interview with a former employee of the asylum, shedding light on the eerie happenings within its walls. But the real breakthrough comes when a voice message from the asylum's deputy warden, Mrs. Bexley, offers you an invitation to visit the notorious institution. A chance to see firsthand if the rumors and whispers hold any truth.

A Sinister Boat Ride
Your journey begins as you board a boat at Heemsley Harbour, bound for the isolated island that houses Whittingham Asylum. The setting sun casts an ominous glow, foretelling the terrors that await you. Mrs. Bexley beckons you to witness for yourself the state of the asylum and write your exposé. Brace yourself for an unforgettable exploration of dark corridors, abandoned wards, and the horrors that lurk within.

Uncover the Truth, if You Dare
As you navigate the twisted corridors of Whittingham Asylum, you'll encounter unimaginable horrors and confront the chilling presence that haunts its halls. Will you maintain your sanity and piece together the puzzle of the disappearances, or will you fall victim to the asylum's sinister secrets?
70010000089357.intro: Will you expose the secrets, or become one of them?
70010000089357.name: Whittingham Asylum: The Investigation

70010000090433.description: You play as young blogger, who loves filming her careless travels in forgotten and forbidden places. She doesn't believe in mysticism and all sorts of superstitions, but one day, wandering into a strange Japanese city, she completely changes her mind...
70010000090433.intro: Unravel the secret of this town and that uncanny mask!
70010000090433.name: Masked Devourer

70010000090464.description:
Dive into TCG Card Shop Master, a 3D game where you’re in charge of your own trading card shop! Start small, expand, and create the go-to spot for TCG collectors and fans.

Customize and Grow
Stock your shelves with trading cards, rare collectibles, and cool accessories. Use your profits to expand floor space and improve your store’s layout.

Connect with Customers
Keep customers happy by listening to their needs and adjusting prices. Strike the right balance between prices and inventory, and build a strong fanbase.

Hire and Manage Staff
As business picks up, hire employees to help run the shop. Assign tasks like restocking shelves and assisting at the cash register to keep things running smoothly.

Collect Rare Cards
Search for rare cards to add to your inventory and showcase them in unique displays. These special finds will attract even more customers and boost your sales.

Create Play Areas
Add game tables for customers to enjoy card battles, boosting engagement and bringing in extra revenue.

Transform your shop into the ultimate TCG hangout, packed with rare cards, cool accessories, and lively play areas. Just be ready to give a friendly nudge when those table dwellers start treating your shop like their second home—there’s only so much free seating to go around!
70010000090464.intro: What’s your strategy for becoming a top card retailer?
70010000090464.name: TCG Card Shop Master

70010000091132.description:
Squab is an exciting precision platform adventure that puts players in control of a young pigeon full of energy but unable to fly. Using the dash as his main means of locomotion, players embark on a challenging journey to rescue his missing father, Maximus. 

Prepare to overcome a variety of challenges while navigating vibrant and dangerous environments. With engaging game mechanics and thrilling gameplay, Squab offers a unique experience that will test your skills and leave you craving more.


Features:
* Over 60 levels
* 3 Biomes
* Stay alert to all challenges
* Relaxing aesthetic and cute pixel art
70010000091132.intro: Can you rescue your father while being unable to fly?
70010000091132.name: Squab

70010000091451.description:
Play the role of a collector who has become a business owner. Open a card market and become rich. Build, manage and develop your own collectible card store where you can trade, collect and battle with the rarest and most valuable cards from the legendary Beast Lords series of unique and powerful creatures!

Run your own collectible card business:
Stock your store with booster packs and individual cards, arrange them neatly on the shelves and set competitive prices to attract customers. As your business grows, you'll need to find a balance between time to sell cards and expanding your collection.

Collect and play:
You can not only sell cards, but also collect them in your personal album. Unlock rare cards and create powerful decks to participate in exciting card battles. Whether you're opening packs to uncover hidden treasures or facing off against opponents, the excitement of the game is always at your fingertips.

Design and Develop:
Create the perfect store environment by improving and decorating your space. Attract more customers with eye-catching displays and keep them coming back with a well-stocked assortment of Beast Lords cards. Will you focus on sales, or chase the rarest cards for yourself?

Features:
- Stock your store with collectible collectible cards.
- Sell, trade or collect cards from the popular Beast Lords series.
- Customize and expand your store as your business grows.
- Take part in exciting card battles to prove your skills.
70010000091451.name: Card Collector Trading Shop

70010000092647.description:
Enter the World of Rookie Table Tennis – Fast, Fun, and Competitive!

Serve, smash, and spin your way to victory in Rookie Table Tennis, the ultimate 3D ping pong showdown! With thrilling solo tournaments, exciting local multiplayer matches, and lifelike visuals, this game brings the table tennis experience to your console like never before.

Game Highlights:

-Realistic Ball Physics: Master spins/lifts, and powerful smashes with precision controls and dynamic gameplay.

-Challenging AI: Take on increasingly skilled opponents in a solo tournament designed to test your reflexes and strategy.

-Intense Local Multiplayer: Grab a paddle and compete against friends in fast-paced, action-packed duels.

-Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in vivid arena with lifelike animations and breathtaking attention to detail.

-Authentic Sound Design: Feel every hit with crisp and realistic sound effects that bring the game to life.

Whether you're training to become a table tennis master or just looking for fast, competitive fun, Rookie Table Tennis is your perfect match.

Ready to Serve? Download now and show the world what a rookie can do!
70010000092647.name: Rookie Table Tennis

70010000092678.description:
Step into a world of serene beauty and discovery in Lush Forest! This relaxing walking simulator invites you to explore three breathtaking levels, each filled with lush greenery, hidden treasures, and peaceful vibes. Your goal is simple: uncover all the locations on your list while soaking in the tranquil atmosphere of the forest.

Key Features:
 Explore 3 Stunning Levels: Wander through beautifully crafted environments that will leave you in awe.
 Scavenger Hunt Adventure: Search for all the hidden spots on your checklist.
 Relaxing Gameplay: No stress, no rush—just a peaceful journey through nature.
 Soothing Soundscapes: Enjoy the calming ambiance as you explore.

Take your time, breathe in the fresh virtual air, and let Lush Forest be your escape.
70010000092678.name: Lush Forest

70050000052466.description:
Enjoy a new original scenario, including new quests and stories.

Note:
- This product is scheduled to become available by the end of January 2025.

- Content can be accessed after reaching a designated point in the game.
- The details and release dates of any content may be changed with no notice. Please see the official site for more details.
- This product is eligible content for the "FAIRY TAIL 2 Season Pass." Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
70050000052466.name: Bonus Scenario

70070000025248.description:
Racers, beware! 

Fast-paced, polished and dynamic motorbike racing now on Nintendo Switch™!

One of a kind game entirely playable with... Toy-Con Motorbike!

Forget about speed limits and traffic rules 'cause on this road you're the boss!

A unique mix of endless and arcade racing game featuring countless hours of fun!

IN MOTO RUSH GT YOU WILL FIND:

• Over 100 levels to beat!
• Endless racing experience
• 12 customizable motorbikes
• Toy-Con Motorbike support
• Race against time, ghost opponents or try various challenges! 
• Motion Controls – play by rotating your console!
• Play with the Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller
• Support all play styles - TV Mode, Tabletop Mode, Handheld Mode, Toy-Con Motorbike
• Experience 4 different game modes 
• Weather and day-cycle effects: rain, night, storm! 
• Experience beautifully designed roads around the world

This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack, Grip Collection #2 and Grip Collection #3 with:

- 4 new vehicles
- New colors for the rest of motorbikes
- New colors for gloves
- Special, Golden colors for motorbikes
- 8 pairs of state-of-the-art racing gloves, crafted for the ultimate grip and control.
70070000025248.intro: Ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages!
70070000025248.name: Moto Rush GT Power Edition

70070000025818.description:
Look out! This pizzeria will soon become the talk of the town!

Well... at least that's the plan. 

Your customers are already queuing up, so you'll have to serve them as quickly as possible. However, that's easier said than done!

Everyone's in a hurry and you'll have to prepare each order correctly, or else your customers are going to get crossed!

Give it your all and you'll come out on top!

IN PIZZA BAR TYCOON YOU WILL FIND:

* 60 levels to explore, 70+ dishes to serve.
* Great cartoonish graphics, music and sound effects.
* Countless upgrades you can apply to ingredients and bar decorations.
* 47 Achievements to complete.
* Easy to play and hard to master.

This bundle includes base game, Endless Mode and Multiplayer Mode with:

Join forces with your friend in the ultimate cooking adventure with this new Multiplayer Mode! 

• local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family. 
• endless gameplay mode

NOTE: to play the Multiplayer Mode DLC, each player will need their own set of Joy-Con™ or an additional Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller.
70070000025818.intro: Become a pizza magnate! Create the best pizza in town!
70070000025818.name: Pizza Bar Tycoon Discovery Edition

70070000026065.description:
Pool Fever brings the classic game right to your Nintendo Switch™, perfect for beginners and pool sharks alike! 

Pool Fever offers a fun, accessible, and realistic billiards experience. With stunning 3D graphics and intuitive gameplay, you’ll feel like you’re playing in your favorite bar or pool hall. Whether you want to play in solo mode or challenge a friend in 2-player local multiplayer – either way, the table is set for hours of entertainment.

Choose from 10 different table designs, 15 unique cues, and 5 custom cue balls to create your perfect game setup. With three difficulty levels, you'll always have a challenge no matter your skill level.

So, chalk your cue, line up your shot, and sink the 8-ball - it’s game time!

Features:

10 different table designs 
15 unique cues sticks
5 custom cue balls 
3 difficulty levels
Play solo or in 2-player local multiplayer
Realistic 3D graphics

This bundle includes base game, expansion pack #1 and expansion pack #2 with:

5 new pool table designs
5 new pool cues designs
70070000026065.intro: The classic pool experience, right at home!
70070000026065.name: Pool Fever Deluxe Edition

70010000090318.description:
In Car Wash Tycoon Business Simulator, bring your dream of owning a car wash business to life! Start with the basics: a simple wash station where you clean your customers' cars by hand. This is how you’ll earn your first money and gain experience. Over time, your business will expand! Attract more customers by adding convenient self-service stations so clients can wash their vehicles themselves.
But that’s not all! As you accumulate funds, you’ll be able to set up powerful tunnel car washes that can process a car from start to finish in just minutes. Grow your business, invest in technology and automation, and build a car wash complex that the entire town will be talking about!
Features:
    Gradual Expansion: Earn money and reinvest it to buy self-service washes, allowing clients to wash      their cars independently, increasing profitability and service accessibility.
    Tunnel Car Washes: Install large automated tunnel washes to speed up service and attract more       clients, helping to boost your income.
    Interior Cleaning Zone: Set up dedicated areas for interior cleaning, offering customers access to      vacuums for self-service cleaning and generating additional income.
    On-Site Shop: Open a small shop where visitors can buy items like water, cookies, or other snacks,      providing a steady stream of extra revenue.
    Business Growth: Automate operations, upgrade equipment, and turn your business into a thriving         complex that becomes the top destination in town!
70010000090318.intro: Transform a simple wash into a car cleaning empire!
70010000090318.name: Car Wash Tycoon Business Simulator

70070000026556.description:
Discover a whole new world of combat sports games. As a newbie boxer, challenge experienced opponents and try to win and score a KO! Explore the world of boxing and make your way to the top. You can become the boxing champion, the best warrior of all time! So get ready to punch, and punch hard! Discover what you’re made of, and try to climb to the top.

Become the ultimate champion! Use jabs, hooks, uppercuts & combine them into devastating combos.

PLAY AS A LEGENDARY BOXER
Receive the legendary Jax Stone with his unique equipment and a bonus of 21500 experience points right from the start!

REMASTERED VERSION
A brand new challenge awaits you as the game has been rebalanced for a fresh and fair boxing experience. With better effects and improved graphics you can feel like you're boxing for real!

CHOOSE YOUR STYLE OF BOXING
Before you KO your opponent, you need to improve your fighting skills! Adjust your boxer's stats to match your playstyle and level up quickly to unlock new abilities that will help you in fights to come! Use powerful boosts to make your dream come true. Get ready - a KO is in the air!

PLAY MINI-GAMES
Train your fighter in exciting mini games that reflect real life boxers’ training and develop your character! You need to leave a lot of sweat in your training hall to be a champion. No one said it would be an easy challenge!

CREATE YOUR DREAM BOXER
Real Boxing 2 allows you to customize your fighter! Choose your outfit, get a new tattoo and even change your haircut. Adjust all the aspects of the fighter’s body, from mass and muscle sculpture to nose shape.

DRESS TO IMPRESS
As in all fighting sports, it's best to enter the punch-out and serve a smackdown with style, so gear up - equip a pair of boots, trousers and gloves that fit your style and knock down your opponents with your looks alone.

BATTLE AGAINST UNIQUE BOSSES
Take on challenging opponents! Clown? Check. Santa? Yeah, he's there. A real stone golem? You bet. Defeat them all and claim their epic gear!

Join the club, create your boxer, and start your boxing career. Get ready to punch, and punch hard! Discover what you’re made of, and climb to the top!
70070000026556.intro: Take the fight to the next level with a remaster of award winning Real Boxing™ 2. Train hard, fight harder. Prove your worth in the career and multiplayer mode.
70070000026556.name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - Stone Edition

70070000026558.description:
After an asteroid catastrophe, your rocket ship crash-lands in the wilderness of Mars. Explore the planet's mysteries, strategize your escape, and build a shelter to protect yourself!

Features:
- Get a premium supply crate with a set of hellas armor, a gemini blaster and lots of scraps, and materials!
- Use additional 500 gems
- Navigate Mars's challenges
- Explore the planet's secrets and discover hidden materials 
- Build a shelter and protect yourself from the harsh Martian environment!
- Defend against alien invasions and uncover secrets of the creatures of Mars!
- Gather oxygen and essential materials from old rocket ships to survive
- Strategize your escape mission and secure your passage back to Earth!
- Open epic loot boxes to swap or upgrade your gear

Go on dangerous expeditions to gather intel and resources. Fight off hordes of alien creatures, and save other survivors. Use their skills and knowledge to defend your base from a huge enemy attack!

Become the last man standing on Mars, navigate through the wilderness, and prove your survival skills!
70070000026558.intro: Conquer Mars, fend off alien threats, and secure your path to survival!
70070000026558.name: Mars Survivor: Explosive Edition

70010000089755.description:
Step into the post-apocalyptic world of Chained Heroes, a thrilling 3D platformer where every jump could be your last! As a player, your mission is to leap across crumbling surfaces, dodge dangerous obstacles, and climb to new heights in a desolate, dystopian landscape. Your goal? Reach the final destination—but what awaits you there is a mystery you'll uncover as you progress through the game.

In this unforgiving world, falling into the water means starting over, so precise timing and sharp reflexes are key to survival. Team up with friends in multiplayer mode, where working together can make all the difference in reaching the top.

Choose from 4 unique skins to personalize your character as you navigate through this hostile environment. Will you conquer the ruins and emerge victorious, or will the waters claim you before you reach the end? Dive into Chained Heroes and find out!
70010000089755.intro: Can you reach the top, or will the water pull you down?
70010000089755.name: Chained Heroes

70010000091754.description:
Get ready for a steampunk-themed adventure in Mechanita, a side-scrolling platformer packed with brainteasing pixel art stages! Take control of a goggled heroine as she carefully navigates 50 unique levels of gradually increasing complexity.

Run, jump and shoot with precision as you try to reach the airship at the far end of each stage. Avoid spike traps and roving enemies, hop on prop-driven lifts, use your blaster to stun robotic foes and jump on their heads to reach greater heights! Will you master this wonderfully mechanized world or fall victim to its clockwork creations?

• Guide a young heroine in a steampunk adventure across 50 pixel art stages!
• Run, jump and shoot with precision to reach the airship and escape.
• Use your blaster to freeze enemies in place or drop them from the sky!
• Reach greater heights by riding propeller lifts or hopping on stunned enemies.
• Avoid traps and dangerous gadgetry!
• Retry stages as many times as it takes or go back to play cleared levels to improve your skills!
70010000091754.intro: Puzzle your way through a steampunk world of precision platforming and roving robots!
70010000091754.name: Mechanita

70010000092017.description:
Welcome to While Waiting. This innovative title invites players into a transformative journey through the art of patience, blending humor with profound life insights.

Numerous Life Situations: Encounter a diverse range of waiting scenarios, spanning from birth to death, providing a comprehensive exploration of life's waiting moments.

Doing Nothing is the Ultimate Strategy: Embrace the essence of the game by understanding that waiting is the key to clearing each situation. No shortcuts or actions can expedite the waiting time.

Comedic Appearance with Serious Core: Experience a unique blend of comedy reactions and a thought-provoking narrative that delves deep into the profound aspects of life.

Easter Eggs Hidden in Boringness: Uncover a multitude of hidden elements and surprises within the game's seemingly mundane waiting periods, transforming moments of boredom into engaging explorations.

Be Patient and Embrace Everyday Life: Learn the art of patience as you navigate the game, gaining valuable insights on embracing and accepting the journey of life itself.
70010000092017.intro: Clear the game by doing nothing, but discover the power of acceptance and patience in numerous situations from birth to death. Learn to embrace life as you wait.
70010000092017.name: While Waiting

70050000053587.description:
HIGH-STICKIN’ TIME! CASEY JONES, OFF THE BENCH!

The Turtles can use all the help they can get as they go up against Shredder and try to get their Father back. Thankfully, their friend and fellow vigilante Casey Jones is always ready to pick up his hockey stick and do some damage. What's more, he happens to know a shortcut to the rooftops of NYC! Strangely, their path takes them straight through the Junkyards and Punk Frog turf. Could this have anything to do with Casey’s missing ride?
They are no match for Casey, though– what he lacks in finesse he more than makes up for in raw power. His Slapshot becomes the first ranged attack in the game, taking down punks left and right.

WELCOME TO THE JUNKYARD

After defeating Karai, you have your choice to enter the Streets, or try your luck in the Junkyard. The Junkyard brings an all new narrative starring Casey, the Punk Frogs, their mechanic, Gigi, and a surprise Punk Frog encore.
While a junkyard wouldn’t normally feel homey, the Punk Frogs have settled in and made it their own. The warmth from the blazing barrel fires, the completely non-toxic pools of water, the artistry of Frog graffiti peppering the landscape. What could be better?
Make sure you visit Gigi’s Chop Shop, the Crane Vista, and complete your stay with a lively bop in the Battlebot Arena.

NEW ENEMIES AND CHALLENGING BOSSES

The Punk Frogs continue to test your patience while you make your way through the Junkyard. The crafty Attila has cobbled together repurposed versions of Stockgen robots to wreak all kinds of havoc. Gigi, the vivacious toad mechanic and a threat the Turtles and their friends have never before faced, wields her sawblade with ferocity to make for a challenging mid-run foe. Your ultimate Junkyard challenge will be Ghenghis’ mech bot, The Junkinator, wielding every weapon the Frogs can find.

NEW WAYS TO PLAY

Earn 5 new Artifacts and explore using Casey’s inspirations, masteries, and tool across your runs with other characters! Artifacts include some helpful additions for Multiplayer runs and new ways to stun enemies. Casey’s suite of powers help him excel with his Special ability, Guard Break, and many more surprises.

CO-OP MADNESS

Your friends don’t own Casey Jones & the Junkyard yet? No problem. Everyone can play the Junkyard in Online Play when the match host has access to it, or you can invite them over for a good old-fashioned game night couch co-op. Get your friends and family excited to share in the experience of Casey Jones & the Junkyard Jam!
70050000053587.intro: Casey Jones joins the fight in this fast-paced, action-packed DLC! Battle through the Junkyard, face new enemies and bosses, and collect new powerful artifacts.
70050000053587.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Splintered Fate - Casey Jones & the Junkyard Jam

70010000064409.description:
Teams of darsanauts got lost during their mining missions on the different moons of the planet Darsalon. You need to complete several rescue missions in which you will have to lead them to the closest base station. They will use their own AI to follow you and to obey your commands. On your way to the base you will have to protect them from dangers and enemies using your laser gun, jet pack, pilot ground and air vehicles, destroy terrain, and even make new paths with the ground maker gun.
Featuring:
- Advanced platformer AI including dynamic terrain detection, jump force calculation, light sensitivity, inter-NPC communication.
- Voice Commands to control companion NPCs.
- Dynamic ground destruction and creation.
- Full Interactive and realistic Liquid physics.
- Realistic off road vehicle physics.
- 8 bit music based on MOS 6581 (SID) chip from 1982.
- 8 bit speech synthesis. 
- Unique render pipeline that combines modern lightning, 2D sprites and 3D models pixelated in real time consistently and with a restricted color palette for an authentic retro feel.
- CRT filter.
70010000064409.intro: The culmination of authentic retro aesthetics meets cutting-edge innovation
70010000064409.name: Moons of Darsalon

70010000066576.description:
■Story
Timothy's grandfather died under a curse.
Remembering a legend that says anything you wish for will come true,
he sets out to reach the top of the Tower of Mu, which was created by the gods.

■Game Details
Use your shots, jumps and midair dashes to overcome the fearsome traps!
Timing, accuracy and nerve are all required for this high-difficulty action game!

■Other
Five highly themed dungeons
Hardcore action
Over 50 types of enemies
Powerful bosses
Subquests such as puzzles and cooking
Countless hidden elements hidden in the world
Comfortable chiptune-style BGM

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
70010000066576.intro: An ultra-difficult action game with beautiful pixel art is waiting for you to take on the challenge!
70010000066576.name: Pixel Game Maker Series Timothy and the Tower of Mu

70010000073812.description:
You are the Demon Lord Kuro on a mission to protect the last of the demonkind. Use your abilities to capture and ensnare other species, make them become one of your powerful weapons!

Game features:

 • Collect items and stack buffs to upgrade your skills and abilities.

 • Smooth and intuitive combat. Use dash to dodge attacks and execute your counterattack!
70010000073812.intro: Conquer the world and continue the legacy of the demonkind!
70010000073812.name: Last Monarch

70010000078660.description:
Discover the hilarious world of Big Helmet Heroes, a 3D beat 'em up combining combat and adventure. Find 29 adorable heroes hidden in fantastic kingdoms and choose your favorites to save the princess. Play alone or with a friend, and try to overcome the formidable challenges that await you!

- Epic and endearing heroes: there are 29 in total, each mastering one of 4 formidable combat styles and possessing their own unique superpower—find them all!

- Hilarious battles: face hordes of goblins and formidable bosses, use the environment to your advantage, and wield whimsical weapons to defeat them!

- Vast and imaginative worlds: explore stunning levels, from medieval fantasy to realms filled with mummies, pirates, and even charming yet fearsome unicorns!

- Local co-op mode: defeat enemies, strategize together, and enjoy chaotic situations as you fight side by side with a friend.

- A challenge for all: easy to start, but much more demanding for the skilled and daring.
70010000078660.intro: Pick your hero and save the princess!
70010000078660.name: Big Helmet Heroes

70010000078849.description:
Your landlord is banging on the door. You have a single coin left to your name. You insert the coin into your slot machine and… JACKPOT! Luck be a Landlord, tonight! 

Collect symbols, build synergies, and defeat capitalism in this cult classic roguelike deckbuilder - now on consoles by popular demand.

Luck be a Landlord combines the unpredictable thrill of slot machines with the strategic depth and replayability of classic deckbuilders. Choose symbols to add to your machine and watch them interact to earn you coins every spin - will you stack your deck with cats, gemstones, fruits…?

Every round the rent increases, but have no fear - capitalism is no match for your cunning. Choose from a varied pool of items to further customise your deck, and watch your coins grow. How long can you hold out against your landlord’s greed?

Note: this game contains no microtransactions or real-world currency gambling.

FEATURES

- A Quirky Cast of Characters
Add symbols to your machine and watch them interact with one another for powerful combos - will you bank on common symbols, or hold out for something more rare?

- Items Galore!
Refine your strategy with items that buff your build, grant extra coins, or make new effects.

- Different Every Run
With more than 150 symbols and 220 items, no two games are alike! Play what you have and discover new strategies.

- 20 Levels to Climb
Defeated your landlord? There’s plenty more where they came from. Ascend through the floors of your apartment building to tackle increasing levels of difficulty.

- Bite-Sized Play Sessions
An average single run takes less than half an hour, perfect for when you're on the go or pressed for time.
70010000078849.intro: Collect symbols and spin to defeat capitalism in the iconic roguelike deckbuilder!
70010000078849.name: Luck be a Landlord

70010000082118.description:
"Momodora: Moonlit Farewell" is the latest installment in the Momodora series. Join Momo, High Priestess of the village of Koho, as she embarks on a divine mission to save her people from imminent destruction at the hands of the demon hordes summoned by a malevolent bellringer.

Story:
Momodora: Moonlit Farewell presents the account of the greatest calamity to befall the village of Koho, five years after the events of Momodora III. Soon after the toll of an ominous bell is heard, the village is threatened by a demon invasion.
The village's matriarch sends Momo Reinol, their most capable priestess, to investigate the bell and find the bellringer responsible for summoning demons. It is their hope that by finding the culprit, they will also be able to secure the safety of the village, and most importantly, the sacred Lun Tree, the source of life and healing for Koho...

Features:
- Gorgeous pixel art and animation
- Action-packed gameplay focusing on melee combos, dodging enemy attacks, and firing arrows at enemies
- The "Sigil" system, which allows for greatly customizable play styles
- Intense and core-shaking boss battles
- Deep exploration into a world rich in lore and atmosphere
- Freely adjustable difficulty levels, allowing you to relax and explore the alluring world at your own pace or take on mighty foes for a real challenge
70010000082118.intro: The culmination of the Momodora series. Purify demons and uncover myths untold.
70010000082118.name: Momodora: Moonlit Farewell

70010000084449.description:
A CLASSIC CONCEPT, TILTED
Under Defeat is a vertically scrolling shooter where you control a helicopter capable of moving in eight directions. It's a sleek, streamlined experience with just two buttons—fire and bomb—making it easy to pick up but hard to master. What sets the game apart is the tilt mechanic: as you turn, your shots tilt slightly left or right, allowing for strategic, angled attacks. You also have a small, satellite-like option unit that shoots independently. However, charging it requires you to release the fire button for a while, creating a tactical ebb and flow rarely seen in this all-out shoot 'em up genre.

NEW ADDITIONS
There’s a big difference between an arcade game and one you play at home, and Under Defeat has gotten several new additions since its arcade debut in 2005. The New Order Mode adapts the game to a modern 16:9 format, and the game has received both sharper textures and four selectable soundtracks. This includes a brand new one from original composer Shinji Hosoe, known for his work on Ridge Racer, Tekken, Street Fighter EX, SuperSweep among many others. Of course, for an authentic experience, you can still play Under Defeat in its original arcade format. How you enjoy this bombastic action fest is entirely up to you! 

A BLAST FROM THE PAST
Under Defeat is a true classic. The game first appeared in arcades, developed by G.rev and released in Japan almost two decades ago. Over the years, it has made its way to several platforms. Most notably, it was released on the Dreamcast in 2006—long after official support for the console had ended. This 2024 edition is the ultimate version of the game, containing all previous content, meticulously ported by genre veterans. 

NEVERENDING WAR
Under Defeat doesn’t throw you into an incomprehensible sci-fi universe that make no sense. Instead, it offers a (mostly) realistic depiction of a futuristic past. Specifically, you play as a helicopter pilot in a drawn-out war between the German-speaking Empire and the English-speaking Union, a conflict that has raged for over a decade. Both sides are exhausted, with heavy losses on each side, yet peace remains elusive. Will this destructive conflict ever end? You'll have to play to find out!
70010000084449.intro: FIGHT FOR PEACE IN THE ULTIMATE VERSION OF AN ALL-TIME CLASSIC!
70010000084449.name: Under Defeat

70010000087192.description:
The ultimate marble shooter game combines puzzle-solving skills with fast-paced action. Each level presents a unique puzzle layout filled with colorful marbles that you must skillfully shoot to match and clear. The game is simple to learn but hard to master, offering endless hours of engaging gameplay.

As you progress, the levels increase in complexity, introducing obstacles, intricate paths, and a variety of power-ups that can clear the board faster or change the game in unexpected ways. Aim carefully and plan your shots to trigger massive chain reactions and earn maximum points.

Whether you're looking for a quick break or a lengthy puzzle adventure, the diverse levels will keep you entertained.
70010000087192.intro: Get ready to blast your way through 200 vibrant and challenging levels in Zumba - The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure.
70010000087192.name: Zumba - The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure

70010000090021.description:
Embark on an exciting journey with Malu in Malu the Princess! After her crown is stolen, Malu sets off on a thrilling adventure to reclaim her royal treasure. Traverse through 40 challenging levels in this precision platformer, where sharp reflexes and skill are your best allies. 

Each level brings new obstacles and adversaries to overcome as you inch closer to recovering the stolen crown. Can you help Malu conquer the challenges ahead and restore her rightful place as the true princess?

MAIN FEATURES IN MALU THE PRINCESS:

- Navigate through 40 challenging levels.
- Enjoy engaging mechanics with the princess.
- Journey through a medieval-themed game.
70010000090021.intro: Help Malu Reclaim Her Stolen Crown!
70010000090021.name: Malu the Princess

70010000090071.description:
Step into the brutal world of ancient Rome in Survival Gladiator: Blades of the Coliseum, a 3D game of action and strategy where you manage your own gladiator empire. As a master of gladiators, your mission is to train and equip your fighters, sending them into fierce battles in the Coliseum to prove their strength and earn glory.

Key Features:
- Train and Equip Gladiators: Purchase new weapons and armours, build gladiator schools, and train your fighters based on their unique types, from agile sword wielders to trident and fishnet handlers.

- Manage Gladiator Resources: Take care of your gladiators' living conditions, ensuring they stay strong and ready for battle. Proper care increases their morale and performance in the arena.

- Buy and Train Slaves: Acquire slaves and turn them into powerful gladiators, training them to become champions in your arena. You can also put them up for auction to earn additional profits.

- Dynamic Combat and Strategy: Each gladiator type has unique abilities and fighting styles, requiring strategic preparation for each fight. Plan your tactics wisely to ensure victory in the bloody arenas.

As you progress, the stakes rise, and every decision you make influences both your fighters' fates and your legacy. Can you build an unstoppable gladiator force and conquer the arena, or will the weight of your responsibilities bring you down?
70010000090071.intro: Train gladiators, conquer the arena, build your legacy!
70010000090071.name: Survival Gladiator: Blades of the Coliseum

70010000090228.description:
◆Intense strategic cat RPG◆
A super casual yet intense adorable cat RPG game!

▼ Accessible for everyone and every cats
Cats the Commander is a game that has a little bit for everyone! both humans and felines!
Come join us in the world full of adorable cats and recruit them to fight in your army!

▼ Simplistic and fun battle system
Customize your team and your special attack
Simply, Strategize and summon your cats to fight
Claw down your enemies until you reach the end!

▼ A new take on tower defense-type game
When you start there is no turning back
The cats will only charge forward and will not stop until they win their battle with glory!

▼ Over 650 characters appear!
Strengthen your team with gacha rolls, no extra purchases needed!
Create your own unique team and clear the stages!

▼ Exclusive original story for the Nintendo Switch™ version
Free the imprisoned Seven Heroes!
A unique story where quirky cats save the world!
70010000090228.intro:
Too cute Cats "Bump! Bump!" adventure RPG!
"Cats the Commander", popular tower defense game,
is now available on Nintendo Switch™!
70010000090228.name: Cats the Commander for Nintendo Switch™

70010000090958.description:
Find your warpath and go all the way. Remember that true strength is not in your body, but in your mind. Every step brings you closer to your goal.

Make lightning decisions - there's no time to wait and doubt. The sharpness of your mind is also a weapon, and you must know how to use it. 

Move through levels without stopping and take out your enemies without regret. Face challenges without fear!     

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Move like a ghost and hit from the shadows!
70010000090958.name: Jumping Ninja

70010000090993.description:
The Liar’s Tavern draws you into a shadowy pub where deception and danger collide. This immersive 3D psychological thriller pits you against three other players in a high-stakes game of dice or cards—but with deadly consequences. Bluff, accuse, and strategize carefully, as every lie or misstep could lead to a fatal drink or a game of Russian roulette.

Survival is your only goal. Each round is a nerve-wracking duel of wit and paranoia, where reading your opponents and mastering the art of deception are key. Choose one of four unique characters, each with hidden motives, and navigate the eerie atmosphere of the tavern, where every decision shapes the unfolding drama.

With unpredictable outcomes, intense mind games, and a richly dynamic setting, The Liar’s Tavern challenges you to outwit and outlast. Will you emerge as the ultimate deceiver, or will your lies catch up with you?
70010000090993.intro: Outwit, deceive, survive—where every lie could be your last.
70010000090993.name: The Liar's Tavern

70010000091050.description:
This game, released in 1986 in Japan, is an adventure game where players take on the role of Lieutenant Brian=W=Kernighan. Piloting the Armored Fighting Walker, Galleouse, the player must defeat three bio-dolls lurking within the research facility.

The game progresses with a 3D RPG-like feel. In addition to moving forward, backward, left, right, and rotating left or right, the player can also perform a 180-degree turn, making for realistic, mech-like movements. When encountering enemies, battles are command-based, but with movement incorporated into the command selection, allowing for highly immersive combat. Utilizing movement-based tactics will be key to overcoming challenges in the game. 

Since this isn’t an RPG, relying on character growth or brute force to push through isn’t possible, which might be seen as challenging, potentially sparking mixed reactions. However, for users seeking a satisfying sci-fi game, this title is recommended. Additionally, interactions with over 20 unique characters and the distinct world setting are also highlights!


*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000091050.intro: Pilot the Armored Fighting Walker, Galleouse and destroy the bio-dolls occupying the secret research facility. A hardcore sci-fi adventure!
70010000091050.name: EGGCONSOLE CARMINE 88 PC-8801mkIISR

70010000091343.description:
COMBINE WEAPONS in the microscopic roguelite turret shooter with macroscopic depth. Survive 6 modes using an astounding array of turrets, perks, mutations and power-ups on this psychedelic journey to the heart of the abyss.

Research permanent upgrades to survive a variety of microbes across 6 game modes, each with multiple "depths".

Pair DNA nucleotides Adenine (rapid fire), Cytosine (precision), Guanine (spread), Thymine (explosive) to discover wild hybrid bioweapons!
* Bomb + Shotgun combines explosives with spread to create Blast Shotgun!
* Bomb + Bomb doubles down on explosive power to make Bazooka!
* Blast Shotgun + Shotgun forms the all-powerful Flak Cannon!

* 49 Turrets with unique strengths and functions
* 96 Perks to mix and match that drastically change how you play
* 75 Weapon & Turret Mods that can turn shots into sticky laser mines or bouncing fireballs
* 64 Mutations alter the challenges you face each run
* 20-minute Runs that can be continued in Endless Mode
* 75 Bassy Electronic Tunes that adapt to the current mood & intensity
* Cosmetics like spider legs and tank tread
* Accessibility Settings for color blindness, motion sickness, and even arachnophobia!
70010000091343.intro: COMBINE WEAPONS in the microscopic roguelite turret shooter with macroscopic depth. Survive using an astounding array of turrets, perks, mutations and powers.
70010000091343.name: Genome Guardian

70010000091631.description:
5 cozy mini games that will take you to the charming world of Treflix. Try your hand at:
- Memory
- Connect the dots
- Puzzle
-Find the difference

The adorable Treflix will show you their world and you'll have a great time with them!
70010000091631.intro: Cute and sweet games for everyone!
70010000091631.name: Treflix: Mini Games

70010000091653.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone.
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. You can also fly while changing the drone's flight mode among three at any time.

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Danyang-gun, Korea with "real" footage!
This work takes place in Danyang-gun, Wonju-si, and Chungjuho.
There are a total of 9 flight courses.
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game.
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot.
Large capacity! You can fly to 9 locations showing the beautiful scenery of Danyang-gun, Wonju-si, and Chungjuho!
Two play modes are supported: course-specific driving mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system.
Visit Danyang-gun, Korea from home at any time!
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery.
70010000091653.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage! You can enjoy the actual beautiful natural scenery in high definition
70010000091653.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Danyang-gun

70010000091855.description:
Bad Parenthood plunges you into a psychological horror where bedtime stories turn into waking nightmares. Play in a suburban home haunted by The Storyteller, a sinister entity born from parental warnings and childhood fears.

Key Features:
- Psychological horror rooted in family dynamics and childhood fears
- Survival gameplay with choices that shape the terror
- Environmental storytelling through eerie notes, drawings, and secrets
- Immersive audio to bring the horror to life

Bad Parenthood forces you to confront the monsters you create—can you protect your family from the fears you’ve awakened?
70010000091855.intro: Survive the nightmare born from your own stories.
70010000091855.name: Bad Parenthood

70010000092879.description:
Perfect for puzzle lovers seeking a calming experience!

30 Unique Levels: 
Stunning puzzles with nature and cozy village themes.

Charming Artwork: 
Gorgeous hand-drawn illustrations to piece together.

Varying Difficulty: 
Levels become more challenging as you progress, keeping it engaging.
70010000092879.intro: Unwind and escape into a peaceful world of jigsaw puzzles! Enjoy 30 beautiful levels featuring serene nature scenes and charming little towns.
70010000092879.name: Relaxing Jigsaw

70070000023898.description:
Expand the strategic horizons of your empire and enjoy more options for your reign with Sid Meier's Civilization® VII Deluxe Edition!

Deluxe Edition includes:
• Full base game
• Early Access - play the game early on February 6, 2025
• Tecumseh and Shawnee Pack
• Crossroads of the World Collection, with post-launch content featuring 2 new leaders, 4 new civilizations, 4 new wonders, a special cosmetic bonus, and more!
• Deluxe Content Pack, which includes:
- 2 leader personas
- 4 profile customizations
- 1 alternate scout skin

The award-winning strategy game franchise returns with a revolutionary new chapter. Sid Meier's Civilization® VII empowers you to build the greatest empire the world has ever known!
70070000023898.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII Deluxe Edition

70070000023899.description:
Expand the strategic horizons of your empire and enjoy more options for your reign with Sid Meier's Civilization® VII Founders Edition! This digital-only edition is only available until February 28, 2025.

Founders Edition includes:
• Full base game
• Early Access - play the game up to 5 days early on February 6, 2025
• Tecumseh and Shawnee Pack*
• Crossroads of the World Collection*, with post-launch content featuring 2 new leaders, 4 new civilizations, 4 new wonders, a special cosmetic bonus, and more
• Right to Rule Collection*, with post-launch content featuring 2 new leaders, 4 new civilizations, 4 new wonders, a special cosmetic bonus, and more!**
• Deluxe Content Pack*, which includes:

- 4 profile customizations
- 1 alternate scout skin
• Founders Content Pack*, which includes:

- 4 profile customizations

The award-winning strategy game franchise returns with a revolutionary new chapter. Sid Meier's Civilization® VII empowers you to build the greatest empire the world has ever known!
